reviewText: Patty Duke played a tough but very believable part in this movie that seems to be based on a true story. How her family overcame insurmountable struggles throughout the film - first financial until she joined the Army to save them from poverty, then the struggle of a family torn by the proud husband's disability to earn the income and the wife's constant battle to meet Army standards while being a wife and mother - makes for a show that captures both the viewer's compassion and pride in their tenacity. We're wondering how we've missed seeing this show over the years, but we are glad we did, and we think most people would like it, also.
summary: Older show, but worth the watching.

reviewText: Great story!  Patty Duke plays a woman who needs to find a job when her husband becomes disabled.  She ends up joining the Army.  After struggling through basic training (and missing her family) and finds that the military life suits her.  Her husband has struggles of his own as he adjusts to no longer being the family's bread winner.  Duke ends up becoming a helicopter pilot.  Based on a true story.  WONDERFUL!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: A Time To Triumph is a true story and so well done. With Patty Duke playing the mother who joins the army to take care of her family, it still rings true today. The army scenes seemed authentic to me. Also was pleased she kept her faith as she was raised and didn't let hard times get her down.

reviewText: HAVING KNOWN MARRIED PEOPLE WHO HAD TO CHANGE THEIR LIFESTYLE BECAUSE OF A MAJOR INJURY, THIS MOVIE RANG SOME BELLS FOR ME. WHILE THE UBIQUITOUS WOMEN'S LIB IS THERE, IGNORING THAT, WE VIEW A WOMAN TRYING TO KEEP HER FAMILY TOGETHER AFTER HER HEAVY CONSTRUCTION WORKER HUSBAND SUFFERS A DEBILITATING HEART ATTACK. WE ASK OURSELVES, WHAT WOULD WE DO IN THE SAME SITUATION? ALTHOUGH NOT A GREAT MOVIE, IT HAS MUCH GOING FOR IT. WELL WORTH A VIEWING OR TWO!  RQ

reviewText: A Time to Triumph tells the story of Concetta (played by Patty Duke) who's construction worker husband, Chuck Hassan, has a heart attack and is no longer able to work and support his family. After losing their home and savings, Concetta looks for work and decides to join the Army, to take advantage of the security and benefits. She advances quickly and eventually becomes a helicopter pilot. It's a really inspirational story and Duke is amazing in the role.  This is a MUST SEE.
summary: Inspirational movie-- GREAT Patty Duke Performance

reviewText: A good family movie.  One could feel the sadness and humiliation for the family when he has a heart attack, and she becomes the bread winner.  A good example of training for the military and the sacrifices made as a military family.  The compromising of a husband when he can no longer make a living and the determination of a wife to to do what she mustto succeed in the military and as a mother and wife.
summary: Good family film.  Patty Duke is a great actress
